ComicInfo.Title: Road Trip
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 16:50:03. [CVDB121553] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 02:29:30. [Issue ID 265666]
ComicInfo.Characters: The Tick,Mystic Order of Arachnid Vigilance Members,Civic-Minded Five [Oddman,Arthur,Mr. Envelope,Radio King],Chainsaw Vigilante,Feral Boy
ComicInfo.Teams: Mystic Order of Arachnid Vigilance,Civic-Minded Five
ComicInfo.Summary: Road Trip: The Tick and Arthur prepare to leave The City but are accosted by the Tick's fellow escaped insane asylum inmates who have come to worship him. Arthur drives and the Tick navigates as the duo head for New York but our hero has a little trouble with the map (starting with the fact that it is a 1959 edition). After countless miles of driving all over creation, Arthur insists that they do the unthinkable--ask for directions. The Chainsaw Vigilante cuts his way through the rest of the Civic-Minded Five and sets his sights on the Tick and Arthur.
